description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Place 25 cards in a 5 by 5 grid to make the 10 best poker hands.  The better the poker hands the bigger score.  Play Solo, against the A.I. or with 4 Local Players.  Any game can also be played as a Speed Game.  A number of top 10 high score tables are kept.  Both USA and UK scoring systems are supported.  Watch out! The A.I. is very hard to beat!
